Republicans jump into action after someone has the guts to stand up  and call BS. It has been less than 24 hours, and here they are on the  floor with an emergency censure to soothe Donald Trump's fragile ego. I  have never seen them leap into action so fast in my life. It was  overnight.

So let's keep just doing the shiny objects. Let's just keep doing the  petty around here. I think yesterday was the 14th time we have tried to  reprimand or censure a fellow Member.
